May Lillemor 'Lill' Lindfors, born May 12, 1940 in Helsinki, Finland, is a Swedish singer, comedian and actress. She resides in HÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¶gby ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬â€œland but has lived most of her life in Stockholm.
Lill made her debut at Hagge Geigert in Uddevalla in 1960 and ever since, she's pure entertainment history. Very successful as a singer, night-club entertainer, comedian and actress. Lill is also the host (1985 in Sweden) of the Eurovision Song Contest (ESC) who by far has made the most memorable entrance. See the clip on You-Tube.
